title: Chalet Pomet
description: This B&B is located in the ski resort of Morillon, one hour from Geneva airport/station. The chalet has 6 en-suite bedrooms, and they offer catered accommodations all year. Skiing reason is from December to April. They offer a strictly vegan week February 26, 2012. In the summer the chalet is open for mountain to mountain hiking trails that start right from the door.
